name: Crazy Cookie Maker: Free Cookie Maker For Kids
name_original: Crazy Cookie Maker: Free Cookie Maker For Kids
description:
Bake the best cookies with the best cookie maker game out! Mix the cookie ingredients and stir to make a good thick dough. Roll the dough into the pan and start cooking. Now its time to decorate! Eat them up and make more for your friends!

FEATURES:

-9 different cookie types

-fun graphics

-wonderful sound!
